wiki.identity: Cosmic Entity whose existence is unknown to the majority of the populace of Earth
wiki.education: Has learned a great deal through observation and studying at various intergalactic universities.
wiki.eyes: Has one eye that is red, and two that are white
wiki.hair: What appears to be his/her "hair" is brown
wiki.powers: Can manipulate cosmic energy for a variety of effects including flight.
wiki.creators: this has not been updated yet
wiki.bio_text: As the sole offspring of the cosmic entity [[Eon]], former mentor of [[Quasar (Wendell Vaughn)|Quasar]], Epoch inherited the role of being the omniscient Keeper of Cosmic Awareness. Though possessed of a vast array of knowledge, Epoch is still a child in cosmic terms.
wiki.bio: As the sole offspring of the cosmic entity [[Eon]], former mentor of [[Quasar (Wendell Vaughn)|Quasar]], Epoch inherited the role of being the omniscient Keeper of Cosmic Awareness. Though possessed of a vast array of knowledge, Epoch is still a child in cosmic terms.
